sense.gloss: to stop up, to close up, to block (up), to plug up, to shut up, to cover (ears, eyes, etc.), to close (eyes, mouth)
to stand in the way, to obstruct
to occupy, to fill up, to take up
to perform one's role, to do one's duty
to feel depressed, to be in low spirits, to mope

sdata.j: ↑冬↑↓ふゆ↓になると↑気↑↓き↓が|ふさぐ|。
sdata.e: I suffer from depression during the wintertime.
